import React, { useReducer } from 'react' import PageTitle from '../../components/layout/PageTitle' const initialState = { cart: [], products: [], user: null, number: 0 } function reducer(state, action) { switch (action.type) { case 'Number2Add': return { ...state, number: state.number + 2 } case 'login': return { ...state, user: { name: action.payload } } case 'intNumber': return { ...state, number: state.number + action.payload } case 'addNumber': return { ...state, number: state.number + action.payload } case 'dividir': return { ...state, number: state.number / 25 } case 'Multiplicar Valor': return { ...state, number: parseInt(state.number) * 7 } default: return state } } const UseReducer = (props) => { const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialState) return (
{state.user ? {state.user.name} : Usuario n√£o Encontrado } {state.number}
) } export default UseReducer
